name: Untitled Rabbit Fox Game
description:
[Submission for the 2020 Conway's Jam of Life - https://itch.io/jam/conways-jam]

Aim: get the highest total population you can! Rabbits are worth more than carrots, and wolves worth more than both!

Camera controls: Move with WASD, hold Right Mouse to rotate the camera, and change height with Q and E.

Gameplay controls: Hit G to fire the creature cannon! Try clicking on a Rabbit or Fox and go for a ride!

We decided to build a minimal virtual ecology based on the predator-prey model, using simple behavioural rules for each creature.
